line_1: And give me back my troth.
Your Friend would be very much mended, in troth,
line_2: Should Airy bestow him a Dash of his Froth:

line_1: Where of thy word then is the troth,
line_2: Which I thought good as any oath?

line_1: Protested by her Faith and Troth,
line_2: She bound the Sentence with an Oath,
You'll swear 't must needs be both.
